headline: L3Harris Secures Contract to Support P-8A Poseidon Aircraft
summary: LHX lands a $34.4 million contract to deliver bomb rack units for P-8A Poseidon jets used by the United States, Canada and Germany.

headline: Lockheed Martin: A Strong Dividend Stock for Industrial Investors
summary: Lockheed Martin Corporation (NYSE:LMT) is included among the 13 Best Industrial Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now.
